What do you think of my decision?  I am not going to get any reconstruction surgery done after my operation to remove the tumor until they confirm clear margins. I am doing this because the surgeon said that if they perform a lumpectomy followed by immediate reconstruction and fail to get clear margins, than a mastectomy is the only option. Has anyone ever done this? The surgeon said she has never seen this done before and I don't want to do anything wrong. I have read online that doing reconstruction after radiation is difficult so would it be okay to do the reconstruction after clear margins are confirmed but before radiation starts or has anyone undergone reconstruction years after a lumpectomy? I am not as worried about my physical appearance as I am worried about getting this cancer out of me! Any suggestions or advice is GREATLY APPRECIATED
